titles.title: Providing for consideration of a concurrent resolution providing for adjournment of the House and Senate for the Independence Day district work period.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 107-117, by Ms. Pryce (OH).
Provides for consideration of a concurrent resolution providing for adjournment of the House and Senate for the Independence Day Work Period. Also, H. Res. 179 is laid on the table.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 48.

bill.summary: 6/27/2001--Reported to House without amendment. Makes it in order to consider a concurrent resolution providing for the adjournment of the House of Representatives and Senate for the Independence Day district work period.
